maqras.text: 49|14|samag-ui yumogmindeul-i jeohuineunmidnaida lago malhadoda illeogalo doe neohuineun midji anihago gwiuiha yeossseubnida lago malhal ppun-ila jeohui simjung-e ajig mid-eum-i ileuji ani hayeossnola man-il neohuiga hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul midneundamyeon geubunkke seoneun neohui haeng-wie daehan bosang-eul jo geumdo gamsohaji ani hasinila sil lo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungman hasim-ila

49|15|midneun sin-ang-in-ilan hananimgwa seonjijaleul middoe uisimhaji anihago hananim-ui sa-eob-eul wihae geudeul-ui jae sangwa saengmyeong-eulo seongjeonhaneun jadeul-i balo midneun sin-ang-indeul-ila

49|16|illeogalodoe neohuiga hananimkkeneohuiui jong-gyoleul illeo jugessdaneun geos inyo geuleona hananim-eun haneulgwa dae jiwie issneun modeun geos-eul asinani sillo hananim-eun modeun geos-eul asim-eu lo chungmanhasinila

49|17|geudeul-i museullim doem-i geudaee ge eunhyeleul bepun geos-eulo saeng-gaghana illeogalodoe neohuiga museullim doem-i na-ege eunhyedoen geos-ila saeng-gagji mal la hananimkkeseo neohuiege eunhyeleul bepusa neohuileul mid-eum-eulo indohasyeoss nani neohuineun jinsildoego seongsilhaeya hanila
49|18|sillo hananim-eun haneulgwa daeji ui modeun bimil-eul algo gyesimyeo neohui ga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gye sinila
50|1|kkapeu i yeong-gwangseuleon kkulan-eulo maengsehasa geudaeneun hananim-ui seonjijala
50|2|geuleona geudeul gaundeseo han gyeong gojaga geudeul-ege natanani geudeul eun nollamyeo igeos-eun singihan il-ila go geudeul bulsinjadeul-eun malhadeola
50|3|jug-eo heulg-i doen hu dasi uligasosaenghandan mal-inyo geugeos-eun ihaedoel su eobsneun bulganeunghan geos-ila
50|4|geudeuljung-e eolmana manh-eun mulileuldaejiga as-agal geos-inji hananim-eun algo iss-euni geubun-ege bojondoen gi log-i issnola
50|5|geuleona geudeul-eun jinliga geudeul ege dolaehayeoss-eul ttae geugeos-eul bu-in haess-euni sillo geudeul-eun hondonsog-e iss nola

50|6|geudeul-eun geudeul-wie haneul-eul chyeodabogo hananim-i eotteohge geugeos-eul chang johago jangsighadoe geu an-e hanjeom-ui gyeolham-i eobsge hayeossneungaleul geudeul-eun suggohaji ani haneunyo
50|7|daejileul neolbge dusa geu an-e hwaggohan sandeul-eul dugo geu an-eseo aleumdaun chomog-i jaung-eulo seongjangke ha sim-eul suggohaji ani haneunyo
50|8|ilohayeo hananimkke gwiuihaneun modeun jongdeullo hayeogeum jikyeobogo chan mihadolog ham-ila
50|9|hananim-eun haneullobuteo chugbogbad eun bileul naelige hasa ilo hayeo gwasuwon-eul gakkugo gogsig-eul suhwaghado log ham-ila
50|10|nop-eun jonglyeonamue juleongjuleong gyeobchige yeolmaeleul jusieo
50|11|hananim-ui jongdeul-eul wihan yangsig eulo hasa jug-eun daejie saengmyeong-eul ju sieoss-euni buhwaldo iwa gatnola
50|12|geudeul ijeon-edo naeseleul bu-in han ja iss-eoss-euni noaui baegseong-gwa la sseuwa samudeuwa
50|13|adeuwa palaowa los-ui hyeong jedeulgwa
50|14|supsog-ui donglyodeulgwa tubaui baegseongdeul-ieoss-euni ideul baegseongdeul-eun seon jijadeul-eul geoyeoghayeo hananim-ui gyeong-go ga geudeul-ege suhaengdoeeossnola
50|15|hananim-i choecho-e changjohal ttae bujogham-i iss-eossneunyo geuleohji aniham ila geudeul-i saeloun changjo-e gwanha yeo hondonhayeo uisimhago issnola
50|16|hananim-eun ingan-eul changjohasa ingan-ui ma-eumsog-e sogsag-igo issneun geos-eul algo iss-eumyeo ingan-ui mog-e iss neun hyeolgwanboda naega deo ingan-ege ga kkai issnola
50|17|dumyeong-i immyeongdoeeo ucheuggwa jwa cheug-e anj-a ingan-ui haeng-wileul gwanchalha go issnola
50|18|ingan-i malhal ttaemada hamkke issdeon cheonsa-e uihayeo gamsidoego gilog doemyeo
50|19|jinlie ttala jug-eum-e ileuni geugeos-i balo neohuiga pihalyeo nolyeog haessdeon geos-ila malhayeojimyeo
50|20|napal-i ullini geugeos-i balo gyeong-gobad-eun gyeong-goui nal-ila
50|21|geuttae modeun ingan-eun geuleul indohal cheonsawa jeung-eonhal cheonsaga geuwa hamkke oni
50|22|neohuiga oneul-eul mugwansimhaessnaniije uliga geu beil-eul geodueo julila geulihayeo oneul-eul bolila
50|23|geuui dongbanjaga yeogie junbi doen geuui gilog-i jeowa hamkke issnaida lago malhanola
50|24|hananim-eul geoyeoghaessdeon omanhan modeun jadeul-eul jiog-eulo deonjila
50|25|geudeul-eun seon-eul silcheonham-e banghae hago uisim-eulo joeag-eul nahneun jadeul imyeo
50|26|hananim anin daleun sindeul-eul sungbaehaessdeon jadeul-ini chamhoghan gotong sog eulo deonjila
